description: Scan decimal expansion of zeta(3) until all n-digit strings have been seen; a(n) is number of digits that must be scanned.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Apery's Constant Digits
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Constant Digit Scanning
crossrefs: Cf. A036902 (last n-digit string seen when scanning the decimal digits of zeta(3)).
author: _Michael Kleber_
